items.sentence: Tom was aware of how serious the situation was.
Tom has done everything Mary said he should do.
My colleague and her husband are both American.
I'm almost certain that that's going to happen.
I know several Canadians who live in Australia.
What do you think about the president's speech?
I can't figure out how to get this window open.
I haven't done a stitch of work in three weeks.
Tom was drinking wine. Mary was drinking vodka.
Tom drank Mary's wine while she wasn't looking.
I've never drunk an alcoholic drink in my life.
Tom says he doesn't feel like drinking tonight.
I'd like a single from the 24th for two nights.
This book is so difficult that I can't read it.
Tom came running after me to give me something.
You should consider letting someone else drive.
Tom's doctor said that he may never walk again.
Do you know if Tom will be coming to the party?
It's obvious Tom doesn't want to talk about it.
I didn't know that Tom was one of your friends.
